issue.title: [Julia] Remove from apache/arrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16044](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16044). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because the Julia implementation has been moved to apache/arrow-julia.
